

******************* SELLER ******************

-- seller creates transaction
txncreate id:swap

-- seller uses their address to accept the 10 minima
txnoutput id:swap address:MxG083KW1NGVDMUCSH72F05SY43TPPPUSRQ6ZQVZUQRZ7NRJZ4R6BMF9F72SKN1 amount:10 tokenid:0x00

-- seller adds the coinid of the nft (found with coins command)
txninput id:swap coinid:0x8FBB56C62EF4DBA55B416D71DC85907AA3CDD48A536761372D558CBD86C47521 scriptmmr:true

-- exports and sends to buyer
txnexport id:swap


******************** BUYER *********************

-- buyer imports
txnimport data:


-- buyer uses their own mini address with the tokenid of the nft
txnoutput id:swap address:MxG082ZJYDTUEKYKVC7FFM8U915U33ND4FHY70SV569RHY58RDA0SEMGMBTKWG0 amount:1 tokenid:0xE8A4D32ACC91CD9055063D322B9CE7F2BA85E0F4EE9144E7E33361265EA2AD43

-- buyer adds coinid of minima tokens used to buy (found with coins command)
txninput id:swap coinid:0xEA6196281C276DF679BEA70897BC6F5FC395B0268391B17F5188C66120ECD134 scriptmmr:true

-- buyer signs transaction
txnsign id:swap publickey:auto

-- buyer exports transaction file
txnexport id:swap file:swap.txn


******************* SELLER ******************

-- seller imports transaction file
txnimport file:/home/neil/minima/minima-combined/swap.txn

-- seller CHECKS (TODO) transaction and signs it
txnsign id:swap publickey:auto

-- seller executes
txnpost id:swap
